body.query: FROM b* | EVAL c = CASE(f::BOOLEAN, "a", "b") | SORT a ASC | LIMIT 10

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.0.9-d797c1c43953276f7799dca5e3ed3ea71a331ca8 "Line 1:25: evaluation of [f] failed, treating result as false.
